channel.title: Making it so you only get 1 starter?
channel.description: any1 know how to do this or atleast says ##### has just got there 2nd starter

item.title: Making it so you only get 1 starter?
item.dc:creator: @curse63 curse63
item.description:
@curse63 wrote:

OOH! I got an idea.Say your giving out 10 santa hats as a starter ( I am on my server ).Well,type ::pickup santa hat ID number here number of santas you want here.Then it’ll get you the amount of santas.
I recommend spawning 999M santas,banking,and every time a new person comes give out ten.

If your doing like a set,In example full rune set + whip,spawn 999M of those,bank,and give out a starter set to every new person coming.

Read full topic
item.source: Making it so you only get 1 starter?
